description: In Windows Vista and Windows 7, S2ML files can be found in the subdirectories of the following directory: [user]\​AppData\​Local\​Blizzard Entertainment\​Battle.net\​Cache\​
In Mac OS X, they can be found in the subdirectories of this directory: [user]/​Shared/​Blizzard/​Battle.net/​Cache/​
NOTE: Since S2ML files are stored using XML formatting, you can open them with any text editor.
